name: config_file.js
description: A config file management library for Node.js.

scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('./dist')) fs.rmSync('./dist', {recursive: true});" && npx tsc
scripts.build:debug: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('./dist')) fs.rmSync('./dist', {recursive: true});" && npx tsc --sourceMap

author: yuko1101 (https://github.com/yuko1101)
